product.name: AeroFlow Pro Wireless Headphones
product.description: Premium active noise-canceling headphones with 40-hour battery life. Engineered for professionals who demand exceptional audio quality and all-day comfort. Features advanced hybrid ANC technology that adapts to your environment.
benefits: Immersive sound isolation for deep focus

store_brand.brand_voice: Premium, tech-forward, minimalist. We speak to discerning professionals who appreciate precision engineering and understated elegance.
store_brand.visual_style: Clean lines, dark backgrounds, bold typography. Product-focused imagery with subtle gradient accents. Minimal clutter, maximum impact.

channel.audience_context: Tech-savvy millennials and Gen-Z professionals interested in premium audio, productivity tools, and work-from-home setups. High engagement with minimalist design aesthetics.

store_context.customer_summary: Audiophiles, remote workers, and professionals seeking premium audio equipment. Customers value quality over price and make considered purchases.
